description: This file defines the main React component for the Restaurants page in a food delivery frontend. It manages state for restaurant data, filters, loading/error states, and pagination. It renders search, filters, restaurant cards, and pagination controls, and fetches data using an API helper.

methods.name: RestaurantsPage
methods.description: Main React component for the restaurants listing page, handles data fetch, filters, pagination, and rendering UI components.

methods.name: handleRetry
methods.description: Function to retry fetching restaurant data upon error.
